title: How do Panasonic Solutions support Education?
subtitle: For a truly engaging learning experience
intro:
Competing for your students’ attention in a digital world can be a challenge. But now, you can meet them head-on with a range of integrated digital solutions from Panasonic.

For your auditoriums and larger lecture theatres, we have a range of AV technologies, projectors and screens which offer pristine image quality and excellent sound reproduction. Your lecturers and tutors are supported by tech that’s robust and reliable, with simple functionality that means they can focus on what really matters.

Plus, for those students off-campus, our range of lecture capture technologies make the blended learning experience truly seamless.
